Artifact Documents.name: Artifact Documents
Artifact Documents.description: This resource lets you view/add documents associated to an artifact

Association.name: Association
Association.description: This resource lets you create, view and update artifact associations

Automated Test Run.name: Automated Test Run
Automated Test Run.description: This resource allows you to retrieve, create, modify and delete automated test runs in a specific project in the system.

Automation Engine.name: Automation Engine
Automation Engine.description: This resource lets you create, and view automation engines in the system

Automation Host.name: Automation Host
Automation Host.description: This resource lets you create, view, update and delete automation hosts in the system

Component.name: Component
Component.description: This resource lets you create, edit, delete and view components in a project

Custom List.name: Custom List
Custom List.description: This resource allows you to retrieve and edit the custom lists defined in a specific project template

Custom List Value.name: Custom List Value
Custom List Value.description: This resource allows you to add custom list values to a custom list in a project template

Custom Property.name: Custom Property
Custom Property.description: This resource allows you to retrieve and edit the custom properties defined in a specific project template

Custom Query.name: Custom Query
Custom Query.description: This resource lets you create custom ESQL queries and return data

Data Mapping Artifacts.name: Data Mapping Artifacts
Data Mapping Artifacts.description: This resource lets you create and retrieve the data mapping for artifacts

Data Mapping Custom Properties.name: Data Mapping Custom Properties
Data Mapping Custom Properties.description: This resource lets you view the custom property data mappings

Data Mapping Custom Property Values.name: Data Mapping Custom Property Values
Data Mapping Custom Property Values.description: This resource lets you view the custom property value data mappings

Data Mapping Field Values.name: Data Mapping Field Values
Data Mapping Field Values.description: This resource lets you view the standard field data mappings

Data Mapping Projects.name: Data Mapping Projects
Data Mapping Projects.description: This resource lets you view the project data mappings

Data Mapping Users.name: Data Mapping Users
Data Mapping Users.description: This resource lets you view and add user data mappings

Data Sync.name: Data Sync
Data Sync.description: This resource lets you retrieve the data synchronization plugins configured and update the synchronization status

Data Sync Event.name: Data Sync Event
Data Sync Event.description: This resource lets you record events in Spira from data-synchronization activities

Document.name: Document
Document.description: This resource allows access to the document attachments in the system

Document Folder.name: Document Folder
Document Folder.description: This resources provides access to the active document folders in the project

Document Type.name: Document Type
Document Type.description: This resources provides access to the active document types in the project

Document Version.name: Document Version
Document Version.description: This resource lets you add new versions of documents

Graphs.name: Graphs
Graphs.description: This resource lets you retrieve custom graph data and images

History.name: History
History.description: This resource lets you view the history of changes made to artifacts

Incident.name: Incident
Incident.description: This resource allows you to retrieve, create, modify and delete incidents in a specific project in the system.

Incident Comment.name: Incident Comment
Incident Comment.description: This resource allows you to retrieve the comments associated with an incident as well as add new comments to an existing incident.

Incident Priority.name: Incident Priority
Incident Priority.description: This resource allows you to retrieve/create incident priorities defined in a specific project template

Incident Severity.name: Incident Severity
Incident Severity.description: This resource allows you to retrieve/create incident severities defined in a specific project template

Incident Status.name: Incident Status
Incident Status.description: This resource allows you to retrieve/create incident statuses defined in a specific project template

Incident Type.name: Incident Type
Incident Type.description: This resource allows you to retrieve/create incident types defined in a specific project template

Manual Test Run.name: Manual Test Run
Manual Test Run.description: This resource allows you to retrieve, create, modify and delete manual test runs in a specific project in the system.

Message.name: Message
Message.description: This resource lets you receive and send instant messages

Project.name: Project
Project.description: This resource allows you to retrieve projects in the system

Project Role.name: Project Role
Project Role.description: This resource lets you view the list of project roles in the system

Project Template.name: Project Template
Project Template.description: This resource allows you to retrieve, create, delete, and update project templates in the system

Project User.name: Project User
Project User.description: This resource allows you to retrieve and modify the users associated with a specific project

Release.name: Release
Release.description: This resource allows you to retrieve and manage the releases and iterations defined in a specific project

Release Build.name: Release Build
Release Build.description: This resource lets you create, and view automated builds in the system

Release Comments.name: Release Comments
Release Comments.description: This resource allows you to retrieve the comments associated with a release as well as add new comments to an existing release.

Release Status.name: Release Status
Release Status.description: This resource lets you retrieve the list of release statuses in the system

Release Test Cases.name: Release Test Cases
Release Test Cases.description: This resource lets you retrieve, add and remove test cases to/from releases

Release Type.name: Release Type
Release Type.description: This resource lets you retrieve the list of release types in the system

Reports: Generated.name: Reports: Generated
Reports: Generated.description: This resource lets you check the status and retrieve a generated reports

Reports: Saved.name: Reports: Saved
Reports: Saved.description: This resource lets you retrieve and generate a saved report

Requirement.name: Requirement
Requirement.description: This resource allows you to retrieve, create, modify and delete requirements in a specific project in the system.

Requirement Comment.name: Requirement Comment
Requirement Comment.description: This resource lets you retrieve and add comments to a requirement in the system.

Requirement Importance.name: Requirement Importance
Requirement Importance.description: This resource lets you retrieve the list of requirement importances in the project template

Requirement Status.name: Requirement Status
Requirement Status.description: This resource lets you retrieve the list of requirement statuses in the project template

Requirement Step.name: Requirement Step
Requirement Step.description: This resource lets you create, modify and retrieve requirement steps

Requirement Test Coverage.name: Requirement Test Coverage
Requirement Test Coverage.description: This resource lets you view, add and remove test cases from requirements.

Requirement Test Step Coverage.name: Requirement Test Step Coverage
Requirement Test Step Coverage.description: This resource lets you view, add and remove test steps from requirements.

Requirement Type.name: Requirement Type
Requirement Type.description: This resource lets you retrieve the list of requirement types in the project template

Risk.name: Risk
Risk.description: This resource allows you to retrieve, create, modify and delete risks in a specific project in the system.

Risk Comment.name: Risk Comment
Risk Comment.description: This resource allows you to add and retrieve risk comments in the system

Risk Impact.name: Risk Impact
Risk Impact.description: This resource lets you retrieve the list of risk impacts in the project template

Risk Mitigation.name: Risk Mitigation
Risk Mitigation.description: This resource lets you create, modify and retrieve risk mitigations

Risk Probability.name: Risk Probability
Risk Probability.description: This resource lets you retrieve the list of risk probabilities in the project template

Risk Status.name: Risk Status
Risk Status.description: This resource lets you retrieve the list of Risk statuses in the system

Risk Type.name: Risk Type
Risk Type.description: This resource lets you retrieve the list of Risk types in the project template

Saved Filters.name: Saved Filters
Saved Filters.description: This resource lets you retrieve the saved filters for a user

Source Code.name: Source Code
Source Code.description: This resource lets you view changes and code in linked source code repositories

Source Code File.name: Source Code File
Source Code File.description: This resource lets you view the source code files

Source Code Folder.name: Source Code Folder
Source Code Folder.description: This resource lets you view the source code folders

Source Code Revision.name: Source Code Revision
Source Code Revision.description: This resource lets you view the revisions in linked source code repositories

Subscriptions.name: Subscriptions
Subscriptions.description: This resource lets you view subscribed items as well as subscribe/unsubscribe to artifacts

System.name: System
System.description: This resource contains information on the overall product instance, including version and settings information

Task.name: Task
Task.description: This resource allows you to retrieve, create, modify and delete tasks in a specific project in the system.

Task Comment.name: Task Comment
Task Comment.description: This resource allows you to add and retrieve task comments in the system

Task Folder.name: Task Folder
Task Folder.description: This resource allows you to retrieve, create, modify and delete task folders in the project

Task Priority.name: Task Priority
Task Priority.description: This resource lets you retrieve the list of task priorities in the project template

Task Status.name: Task Status
Task Status.description: This resource lets you retrieve the list of Task statuses in the system

Task Type.name: Task Type
Task Type.description: This resource lets you retrieve the list of Task types in the project template

Test Case.name: Test Case
Test Case.description: This resource allows you to retrieve, create, modify and delete test cases in a specific project in the system.

Test Case Comment.name: Test Case Comment
Test Case Comment.description: This resource lets you add and view comments associated with test cases

Test Case Folder.name: Test Case Folder
Test Case Folder.description: This resource allows you to retrieve, create, modify and delete test case folders in the project

Test Case Folder Test Cases.name: Test Case Folder Test Cases
Test Case Folder Test Cases.description: This resources lets you retrieve test cases and count test cases by their containing folder

Test Case Link.name: Test Case Link
Test Case Link.description: This resource lets you add linked test cases to a test case

Test Case Parameter.name: Test Case Parameter
Test Case Parameter.description: This resource allows you to add/remove parameters to test cases

Test Case Priority.name: Test Case Priority
Test Case Priority.description: This resource lets you retrieve the list of Test Case priorities in the project template

Test Case Status.name: Test Case Status
Test Case Status.description: This resource lets you retrieve the list of Test Case statuses in the system

Test Case Type.name: Test Case Type
Test Case Type.description: This resource lets you retrieve the list of Test Case types in the project template

Test Configuration Set.name: Test Configuration Set
Test Configuration Set.description: This resource lets you retrieve test configuration sets

Test Run.name: Test Run
Test Run.description: This resource allows you to retrieve, create, modify and delete test runs in a specific project in the system.

Test Set.name: Test Set
Test Set.description: This resource lets you create, view, edit and delete test sets in the system

Test Set Comment.name: Test Set Comment
Test Set Comment.description: This resource lets you add and view comments associated with test sets

Test Set Folder.name: Test Set Folder
Test Set Folder.description: This resource lets you create, view, edit and delete test set folders in the system

Test Set Folder Test Sets.name: Test Set Folder Test Sets
Test Set Folder Test Sets.description: This resources lets you retrieve test sets and count test sets by their containing folder

Test Set Parameter.name: Test Set Parameter
Test Set Parameter.description: This resource lets you the retrieve test parameter values associated with test sets

Test Set Test Case.name: Test Set Test Case
Test Set Test Case.description: This resource lets you create, view, modify the test cases associated with test sets

Test Set Test Case Parameter.name: Test Set Test Case Parameter
Test Set Test Case Parameter.description: This resource lets you retrieve the test parameter values associated with the test cases inside a test set

Test Step.name: Test Step
Test Step.description: This resource lets you create and delete test steps from test cases in the system

Test Step Parameter.name: Test Step Parameter
Test Step Parameter.description: This resource lets you retrieve the parameters associated with a specific test step

User.name: User
User.description: This resource lets you create, retrieve and delete users in the system

User Contact.name: User Contact
User Contact.description: This resource lets you view a list of contacts, add a contact and remove one
